comments.body:
I assume that without `| NumericDictionary<T>`, this fails for NumericDictionaries because `T` is always `{}`?

(I just don't want to add `| NumericDictionary<T>` unless it's really necessary.)
Without the `| NumericDictionary<T>`, it incorrectly infers type `T` to be `any` when passing a `NumericDictionary` as the param.
